tool_description: Vedic Rishi Free APIs for Basic Astrological and Horoscope Details along with numerous Numerological details. It also provides panchang or hindu/indian calendar details.
name: Basic Horoscope and Numerology
title: Basic Horoscope and Numerology

api_list.name: Numerology basic details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vedicrishi-horoscope-matching-v1.p.rapidapi.com/numero_table/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vedicrishi-horoscope-matching-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you give me a detailed numerology report?
I would like to know my basic numerology details.
Please provide a numerology report for me.
What does my numerology report say?
Can you tell me about my numerology details?
I need a numerology report.
Could you provide my numerology details?
I want to know my numerology report.
Give me a detailed report on my numerology.
What are my basic numerology details?

api_list.name: Basic Astrological Details
api_list.description: Provides the complete avakahada details e.g. nakshtatra, charan, tithi, karan, yog ,varna, vashaya, yoni, etc

        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Basic panchang details at the time of sunrise
api_list.description: Provides data points for panchang elements, chaugadiya and sunrise and set time at he time of  sunrise.

utterances.utterance: What are the panchang details for sunrise on January 1st, 2024?
Can you provide the chaugadiya for sunrise on March 15th, 2023?
I need the sunrise and sunset times for April 10th, 2023.
Tell me the panchang elements at sunrise on July 4th, 2023.

Give me the sunrise panchang details for November 11th, 2023.
I want to know the chaugadiya at sunrise on February 14th, 2023.
Provide the sunrise and sunset times for August 8th, 2023.
What are the panchang details for sunrise on October 31st, 2023?
Can you tell me the panchang elements at sunrise on May 5th, 2023?

api_list.name: Basic panchang details

        }
